thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 21 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Diana Containerships Announces Sale Of Another Post-Panamax Container Vessel

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Diana Containerships Announces Sale Of Another Post-Panamax Container Vessel
text:
May 21 (Reuters) - Diana Containerships Inc:
* PRESS RELEASE - DIANA CONTAINERSHIPS INC. ANNOUNCES THE SALE OF ANOTHER POST-PANAMAX CONTAINER VESSEL, THE M/V PUELO
* DIANA CONTAINERSHIPS - SIGNED MEMORANDUM OF AGREEMENT TO SELL TO UNAFFILIATED THIRD PARTY “PUELO” FOR SALE PRICE OF US$20.5 MILLION BEFORE COMMISSIONS
* DIANA CONTAINERSHIPS INC - EXPECTS TO USE WHOLE OR PART OF NET PROCEEDS FROM SALE OF VESSEL TO PREPAY EXISTING INDEBTEDNESS
* DIANA CONTAINERSHIPS INC - EXPECTS TO USE WHOLE OR PART OF PROCEEDS TO PREPAY EXISTING INDEBTEDNESS BASED ON OUTSTANDING AMOUNT OF SUCH INDEBTEDNESS
* DIANA CONTAINERSHIPS INC - 2006-BUILT VESSEL “PUELO” DELIVERY TO BUYER BY LATEST JUNE 30, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
